Articles.Content: title says it all. It should be here, no?
Do you think they went out of business?
yup idk where it is i think they will release it tommorow or tonight...
Why is there one of these threads every Tuesday....
I don't know, in CST i go to TaeKwonDo at 5:00 pm, get back at 6:00 pm and it's normally here. WHERE IS IT?

Why is there one of these threads every Tuesday....

Because it gets later and later every Tuesday.

Why is there one of these threads every Tuesday....

Because people expect them on tuesdays. And they are released at about 1:00 to 2:00 AM central time on Wednesday

In short: be patient

KSP Weekly was released last week at 3pm according to what I saw.

5 hours ago they posted about the chance to win a copy of KSP on Facebook.

I think I need to step away from the computer - seeing when it updates is driving up my blood pressure!

Edited October 15, 2013 by paleorob
Clarification

I'm sitting here hoping I can get some play time on 0.22 before I leave tomorrow morning (4am...) for Other Places For Two Weeks.

We'll see! I expect they're probably madly fixing bugs in the hopes of publishing a "HERE'S 0.22!" Weekly.
I have no idea what you are all on about! Its Wednesday midday for some of us . It will happen when it happens...... I just hope it happens soon
It's up, and i'm pretty damn satisfied, now time for sleep
Weekly up with the date 10/16/13...an actual date?!?!

22 tomorrow!

And I'll be out of town all day....
looks like an announcement to me !!
